channel.title: Why the fuck

item.title: Why the fuck
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Waffendennis, post:5, topic:246623”]Well not quite ‘shrinking’ but they’re experimenting with ‘nanobots’ that can perform surgery whilst being in yourbody, they think those things can cure cancer and what more.

Would be sick, those bots have their own life and can go inside us… What if they will start to take over our boddies? Would be mad evil something that we created turning against us.[/quote]
carbon nano tubes can manipulate molecules and change their properties. Having one inside you will only cure a cancerous tumour if the nanotube knows the status quo of your DNA as it were. Of course, this will condemn the planet to an over infestation and likely destroy us all as we will be deprived of water, food and housing. It is likely that unless we control our population NOW we will be having wars for simple supplys like water. Euthanasia(or however you spell it) is probably the best way, if we end peoples lives early then there will be no need for people to keep re-producing at such an alarming rate.

Read full topic

item.title: Why the fuck

item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Xbox Live™:

Why the Fuck do you fucking idiots have no life you have to judge everything you see on here, pretty sad if you ask me.

Because to be respected you have to earn respect.
Posting countless stupid threads and flooding up the boards is not deemed “respectful”.

Welcome to moparisthebest- the real world conveyed through data.

Read full topic

item.title: Why the fuck
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Xbox Live™:

Why the Fuck do you fucking idiots have no life you have to judge everything you see on here, pretty sad if you ask me.

Human nature has proved that upon meeting someone you judge them immediately and develop an opinion on them just because of what a person looks like.

Of course we judge your posts, just as you judge everybody else’s, apparently you’re just too stupid to understand your ideas are as plausible as a 5 year olds fantasies.

Read full topic
